com.metreeca.rest.handlers

Class Delegator

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.metreeca.rest.handlers.Delegator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Handler
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Actor, Generator, Graphs, SPARQL

    public abstract class Delegator
extends Object
implements Handler
    Delegating handler.

    Delegates request processing to a delegate handler, possibly assembled as a combination of other handlers and wrappers.
